title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 223.2 - Registration Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 223.2 - Registration Fees

State Regulations
(a) A
contractor or subcontractor that is not a certified minority or women-owned
business enterprise pursuant to article 15-A of the New York State Executive

Law shall pay a non-refundable fee of $200 at the time of registration in a
manner prescribed by the commissioner. (b) A contractor or subcontractor that is a
certified minority or women-owned business enterprise pursuant to article 15-A
of the New York State Executive Law shall pay a non-refundable fee of $100 at
the time registration in a manner prescribed by the commissioner. Notes

223.2

Adopted

New

York State Register August 28, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 35, eff. 8/28/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
